Bella Thorne Is Shutting Down All Those Romance Rumors With This Bit of Advice Gossip Entertainment / Gossip 1638 Views

Not everyone you see Bella Thorne with is her new love interest. The 19-year-old singer and actress caught up with E! News at the iGo.Live app launch...
